roleset.name: share, giving into co-ownership
roleset.note: SHARE-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to share.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from share.01-n)
SHARING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, 'share-v.01'. No VNcls (from sharing.01-n)

role.descr: shared with, if separate from arg0

example.name: no second sharer
example.text: It hasn't diversified beyond steel, nor has it-1 linked up with a joint venture partner *trace*-1 to share costs and risks.

example.name: sharers merged into arg0
example.text: I have never seen a case of incompetence-1 shared *trace*-1 by so many participants.''

example.name: all args
example.text: One way out of that dilemma could be a partial recapitalization in which [the pilots]-1 would wind up *trace*-1 sharing the value of their concessions with public shareholders.

example.name: the workers here both leave work to be done (share) and do work (receive) in this example. This should be RARE
example.text: They all did their share of the work

example.name: Scotland is only a recepient here
example.text: Nine in ten (91 per cent) of those who think Scotland gets more than its fair share of UK government spending agree that Scotland should raise its own taxes,

example.name: arg1
example.text: Thanks to info - sharing , WHNP-1 the internet gives an insurgency *-1, they 're back at it , with better wiring diagrams . A week ago -LRB- Oct. 24 '05 -RRB- , a pressure bomb shredded a Humvee in Baqouba , tearing four GIs legs to pieces .
example.arg: WHNP-1 the internet gives an insurgency *-1

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: A guide's endearment to his horse is vivid in his sharing of an improvised raincoat

example.name: All args
example.text: I am reading Dr. Alexander's book, and I appreciate his sharing of the NDE with the world.

example.name: unmentioned shareholders
example.text: Seeking to to overcome the currency problems, [Mr. Giffen's American Trade Consortium, which comprises Chevron Corp., RJR, Johnson& Johnson, Eastman Kodak Co., and Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.]-1, has concocted an elaborate scheme *trace*-1 to share out dollar earnings, largely from the revenues of a planned Chevron oil project.
example.arg: dollar earnings, largely from the revenues of a planned Chevron oil project
